# Iteration 07 — Game State & Screens

## Goal

Control the flow of the game using screens.

At the end of this iteration:
- Start screen works
- Game screen starts game
- Game over screen shows result
- Restart resets the game

This iteration is about **state**, not mechanics.

---

## Files Allowed to Touch

- js/game-state.js (new)
- js/main.js (only to import game-state.js)

❌ No new mechanics  
❌ No new movement  
❌ No new rules

---

## Required DOM Elements

```txt
#start-screen
#game-screen
#game-over-screen
#start-btn
#restart-btn
#result-text
